Wallet.ActivateText1: Prepare your wallet yo unlock all features!

WalletCreate.PasscodeTitleText: Add a PIN to ensure that only you have access to unlock your wallet.
WalletCreate.PasscodeDescText: PINs are just a secure as long passwords, but easier to use and remember.
WalletCreate.PasscodeConfirmTitleText: There will be NO 'Restore PIN' button. Make sure you remember it.
WalletCreate.PasscodeConfirmDescText: Add a PIN to ensure that only you have access to unlock your wallet.

WalletCreate.FinalizeStep3Text: Saving your encrypted keys to a local secure vault on this device.

WalletImport.TitleText: To restore or import your wallet, kindly enter your 12 or 24 distinct words in the correct sequence.

HordesPlugin.SignMessageNoteText1: No transactions will be broadcasted and no fees will be applied.
HordesPlugin.SignMessageNoteText2: By signing this message, you prove that you are the owner of an account without broadcasting any on chain transactions. This signature cannot be used to send transactions on your behalf. You should only sign messages you trust.
